desc: Niagara, Ontario winery with Certified Sustainable Vineyards. Free shipping for online orders of $99 or more, virtual tastings, patio tasting flights. Local VQA premium winery. Producing Gamay, Rose, Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, Sparkling wine, Red Wine, White Wine, Vegan wines, low/no sugar wine.

layout.text: Certified Sustainable - Vineyard and Winemaking - “The decisions we make today, take into consideration our long-term impact in the years and decades to come. Our goal is to leave the land in better condition than when we started.” Shiraz Mottiar, Winemaker
